propertiesMeta.name: command
propertiesMeta.description: The command for the light. (Default: Command, DataType: Binary/Analog)

propertiesMeta.name: feedback
propertiesMeta.description: The feedback for the light. (Default: Feedback, DataType: Binary/Analog )

propertiesMeta.name: reset
propertiesMeta.description: The object to reset the light into automatic mode. (Default: ResetState, DataType: Binary)

propertiesMeta.name: state
propertiesMeta.description: The state of the light (autoActive, hand, autoInactive). (Default: StateMI, DataType: Multistate)

propertiesMeta.name: name
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the light. (Default: sName, DataType: string)

propertiesMeta.name: initialize
propertiesMeta.description: Flag to initialize the light. (Default: bInitialize_In, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: cmdToggle
propertiesMeta.description: Toggle to switch the light on and off. (Default: bToggle_In, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: fdbLightOn
propertiesMeta.description: Feedback if the light is on or off. (Default: bLightOn_Out, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: operationState
propertiesMeta.description: The state of the light (autoActive, hand, autoInactive). (Default: eOperationalState_Out, DataType: intger)

propertiesMeta.name: resetManual
propertiesMeta.description: Symbol to reset the light into automatic mode. (Default: bResetManual_In, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: cmdBrightness
propertiesMeta.description: The command for the brightness. (Default: fLightValue_In, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: fdbBrightness
propertiesMeta.description: The feedback for the brightness. (Default: fLightValue_Out, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: cmdTemperature
propertiesMeta.description: The command for the light temperature. (Default: fLightTemperature_In, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: fdbTemperature
propertiesMeta.description: The feedback for the light temperature. (Default: fLightTemperature_Out, DataType: number)
